title: Cannot connect to server
body:
I cannot connect to the oce server queue anymore. The EUW works fine on a different account..
Any ideas?

replies.body:
I have found two solutions that have worked for me:
1. Try unticking the Remember Me box and logging in from there.
2. Change your DNS server address to 8.8.8.8

I hope this helps!

my acc was stolen i only just got it back today, the person that posted this thread was in control of my account, im just posting this to let you know what has happened, possibly explaining why they were having problems, also to help you if you run into this type of thread again.
Bump, I am getting the same issue. Have tried what you have tried as well, quite frustrating.
Can any support people to help and reply us? I have a same issue.

Used different account on OCE (did not work)
Syncing my windows time (did not work)
Resetting all internet explorer options (did not work)
Disabling offline mode in internet explorer (did not work)
Restarting computer (did not work)
Restarting router (did not work)
Changing my IP address (did not work)
Reinstalling League of legends (did not work)
Logging onto Euw server on a different account (DID WORK)
Also I got this message There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit.
